hadiths.text: It was narrated that Rafi 'bin Khadji said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade Muhaqalah and Muzabanah, and said: 'Only three may cultivate: A man who has land which he cultivates a man who was given some land and cultivates what he was given; and a man who takes land on lease for gold or silver.' ”

chapter.eng-name: Lending Land In Return For One Third Or One Quarter (Of The Crop)
